item.title: Dees' recruit facing delayed start to season after injuring hamstring
item.description: Melbourne is sweating on the extent of Tom Fullarton's hamstring injury, while Harry Petty is on the verge of returning to full training

item.description: Sean Darcy made a big step in his return from an ankle injury, joining Fremantle's match simulation session on Friday

item.description: Josh Gabelich assesses the back-up options in the ruck for each club ahead of the 2024 season

item.title: Veteran Demon sidelined after undergoing knee surgery
item.description: Ben Brown developed some knee soreness and swelling with scans showing a loose piece of cartilage in the knee joint

item.title: Forward thinking: Off-season overhaul has Hawks spoilt for choice
item.description: An influx of forward line talent over the summer means competition for spots will be fierce at Hawthorn in 2024

item.title: Dogs appoint new footy boss, begin search for women's GM
item.description: Former Geelong defender steps up to lead men's football department as part of Bulldogs' review

item.title: Season over for Blues forward after ACL tear
item.description: Jack Silvagni's 2024 season is over before it began, with the 26-year-old rupturing his ACL at training

item.title: Saints part ways with CEO, hunt for new boss begins
item.description: St Kilda and Simon Lethlean agree to fresh start after club's demands "shifted"

item.title: Saints livewire in race to be fit for round one
item.description: A lingering ankle issue has Saints forward Dan Butler in a fight to be fit for round one

item.title: Top pick shines in Eagles' match sim, luckless mid praised
